channel.title: Help
channel.description:
hai when i go to sign it it say's "sorry loading char profile. but it doesnt let me in. try logging in again"
its the whitescape server+client, delta

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @chaotic_twin chaotic twin
item.description:
@chaotic_twin wrote:

[quote=“jwags, post:4, topic:406215”]nvm i do, but i wont be here long, jordan4tw

ok skype me and ill send you a compiler file or ill help you out, it might be named build, or in your run file it might be press r to run or press c to compile, you could also be click here to play or play. people name it weird things sometimes. and to create a new character file, just rune the server, run your client, when the client finishes loading, click log in, and use any old user and pass (a user not used yet) and login with that, you can see what characters have been made by going to the character folder in your source/ server file.[/quote]
added

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @jwags jwags
item.description:
@jwags wrote:

nvm i do, but i wont be here long, jordan4tw

ok skype me and ill send you a compiler file or ill help you out, it might be named build, or in your run file it might be press r to run or press c to compile, you could also be click here to play or play. people name it weird things sometimes. and to create a new character file, just rune the server, run your client, when the client finishes loading, click log in, and use any old user and pass (a user not used yet) and login with that, you can see what characters have been made by going to the character folder in your source/ server file.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @chaotic_twin chaotic twin
item.description:
@chaotic_twin wrote:

[quote=“jwags, post:2, topic:406215”]1 make sure you compile both the client and server before running either (check for errors be4 closing them)
2 run both the client and server (dont use a client that doesn’t come with the server, some servers are cheat protected so you cant login to that server using another client)
3 if it still does not let you log in go to your ban folder, ipban, bans, ipbans, or any other file with a similar name, and make sure your character is not in that file.
4 try creating a new character to log in with
5 if all else fails, try logging in one more time, go to your server cmd, (the thing that pops up when you run your server/source and see what it says, it might be like character “name here” loading power 0something or another
connection failed/accepted" if power is 0 its bad, u want it to be 15. tell me what u get[/quote]do you have skype?
the client doesnt have a comiler?:S that cant be good
i downloaded server+client
how do i create new ccharecterfile?

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @jwags jwags
item.description:
@jwags wrote:

1 make sure you compile both the client and server before running either (check for errors be4 closing them)
2 run both the client and server (dont use a client that doesn’t come with the server, some servers are cheat protected so you cant login to that server using another client)
3 if it still does not let you log in go to your ban folder, ipban, bans, ipbans, or any other file with a similar name, and make sure your character is not in that file.
4 try creating a new character to log in with
5 if all else fails, try logging in one more time, go to your server cmd, (the thing that pops up when you run your server/source and see what it says, it might be like character “name here” loading power 0something or another
connection failed/accepted" if power is 0 its bad, u want it to be 15. tell me what u get

Read full topic
